channel.title: [REQ] CalculateMaxHit [REQ]
channel.description:
Okay firstly, mods, if this against the rules to request things, please lock it without any arguements..
To other people who say "Reported" against rules. Or what ever. Just tell me please.
--
Can someone post me a realistic CalculateMaxHit() method?.. Cause atm mines hitting 40's. As in realistic rs, hits go by str bonus and level. Etc.
Thanks
~ X J K X

item.title: [REQ] CalculateMaxHit [REQ]

item.description:

Work with your bonuses, or just edit the method to work properly with your bonuses so you don’t hit as high.

item.title: [REQ] CalculateMaxHit [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

heres my sexy one

public void CalculateMaxHit() { double MaxHit = 0; int StrBonus = playerBonus[10]; //Strength Bonus int Strength = playerLevel[playerStrength]; //Strength if (FightType == 1 || FightType == 4) { //Accurate & Defensive MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00125)); //13.6434375 } else if (FightType == 2) { //Aggresive MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(StrBonus * Strength) * 0.0015)); //16.372125 } else if (FightType == 3) { //Controlled MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00131)); //14.2983225 } MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.2); if (StrPotion == 1) { //Strength Potion MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.0014); } else if (StrPotion == 2) { //Super Strength Potion MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.0205); } if (Str1) { //Burst Of Strength MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.005); } else if (Str2) { //Super Human Strength MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.01); } else if (Str3) { //Ultimate Strength MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.015); } if(FullDharokEquipped()) { MaxHit += (getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]) - playerLevel[playerHitpoints])/2; } playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit); }
working str pots, pray, and full dharok hits higher XD

Read full topic
